---
name: ReactLiveProps AutoProps Example
---

# ReactLiveProps Basic Example with Auto Generated Props

import { PropsTable } from 'docz'
import { ReactLiveProps } from 'react-live-props'
import ExampleComponent from './ExampleComponent'

<PropsTable of={ExampleComponent} />

<ReactLiveProps auto-generate={true}>
  <ExampleComponent/>
</ReactLiveProps>
